mapper.select: SELECT trans.id AS id,trans.status AS status,trans.confirm_time AS confirmTime FROM t_loan_user_transaction trans WHERE trans.type = 2 AND trans.user_id = #{id} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_loan_user_repayment_visit WHERE transaction_id = trans.id AND user_id = trans.user_id)
SELECT bid.id AS id,bill.repayment_time AS repaymentTime from t_loan_bill bill LEFT JOIN t_loan_bid bid ON bill.bid_id = bid.id WHERE bid.status = 5 AND bill.status = 1 AND bid.user_id = #{id}

SELECT tu.id AS id,tu.bid_id AS bidId,tu.status AS status,tu.update_time AS updateTime FROM t_loan_user_transaction tu LEFT JOIN t_loan_temp_table tt ON tu.bid_id=tt.relase_id WHERE tu.type = 2 AND tu.status = 1 AND tu.confirm_time < #{time} AND(( tt.re_run_times < 2 AND tt.job_name='repayFail' ) OR tt.relase_id is null)
